# Formacao

```{r csv}

file_name <- "CV-2021-formatacao2.csv"

tabela_mae <- read.csv2(file_name, sep = ";", header = TRUE)

tabela_imprimir <- matrix(data = NA, nrow = 3, ncol = 3)

for (i in 1:3) {
  if (idioma_cv == "PT") {
    if (modelo == 1) {
      tabela_imprimir[i,1] <- stringr::str_glue(tabela_mae[i,"ano_inicio"], " até ", tabela_mae[i,"ano_fim"], " - ", .sep = "")
      tabela_imprimir[i,2] <- stringr::str_glue(tabela_mae[i,"tipo_PT"],  " ", tabela_mae[i,"conec_PT"], " ",  tabela_mae[i,"nome_PT"], " - ", .sep = "")
      tabela_imprimir[i,3] <- stringr::str_glue(tabela_mae[i,"ies_nome"], " (", tabela_mae[i,"ies_sigla"], ")", .sep = "")
    }
  }
}

View(tabela_imprimir)

kbl(tabela_imprimir, col.names = NULL)


#knitr::kable(tabela_imprimir, align = "llll", col.names = NULL)
```
